Vertex.description: Google Vertex AI provides access to powerful large language models.

ModelGarden.description: Access models from Google's Model Garden repository.

Langchain.description: Provides integration with various language models through the Langchain framework.

LLMService.description: Provides access to custom or locally hosted language models.

Truss.description: Provides access to Truss' Llama2 models.

vLLM.description: Provides access to vLLM's Gemma models.

Anthropic.description: Provides access to Anthropic's Claude model.

OpenAI.description: Provides access to OpenAI's powerful language models like GPT-3, GPT-4, and others.

Cohere.description: Provides access to Cohere's large language models.

default_system_prompt: You are a helpful AI assistant.
